text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Eligible field of employment" means employment in the State by an organization, institution, association, society, or corporation that is exempt from taxation under § 501(c)(3) or (4) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
"Eligible field of employment" includes employment by the State or any local government in the State, but does not include being employed as a judicial clerk in any court.

text.section:
"Higher education loan" means any loan for undergraduate or graduate study that is obtained for tuition, educational expenses, or living expenses from:
A college or university, government, or commercial source; or
An organization, institution, association, society, or corporation that is exempt from taxation under § 501(c)(3) or (4) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
"Program" means the Janet L. Hoffman Loan Assistance Repayment Program.
